text: Arau tumi sihamtaka dekhahemtena, surya udaya horaara samayata sihamtara guhara som phale dhala khaya arau asta yoraara samayata sihamtaka atikrama karai ba'om phale dhala khaya, athaca sihamta guhara prasasta cotalata (su'i ache), e'ibora allahara nidarsanasamuhara majata an'yatama. Allahe yaka satpathata paraicalita karae, si satpathapraapta arau te'om yaka pathabhrasta karae, tumi ketiya'o tara babe kono pathanirdesakarai abhibharaka bicarai napaba
